abstract: Shares of the data storage company, whose biggest customer is Facebook, rise more than 18 percent in their debut on the New York Stock Exchange.
snippet: Shares of the data storage company, whose biggest customer is Facebook, rise more than 18 percent in their debut on the New York Stock Exchange.
lead_paragraph: 4:22 p.m. | Updated Shares of Fusion-io ended up more than 18 percent on their New York Stock Exchange debut on Thursday, the latest technology offering to be met with strong investor demand.
